scripts.create-docker: docker run --name ParkServer -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=mysecretpassword -e POSTGRES_DB=ParkServer -p 5433:5432 -d postgres:13.22
scripts.init-db: npm run create-docker && sleep 10 && npm run create-schema && npm run seed-db
scripts.create-schema: cat ./init.sql | docker exec -i ParkServer psql -U postgres -d ParkServer
scripts.seed-db: cat ./seed.sql | docker exec -i ParkServer psql -U postgres -d ParkServer
